meanings.sent1: Under the microscope, the scientist observed the supermicros moving around.
meanings.sent2: The pond water was teeming with various supermicros.
meanings.sent3: The supermicros threw a tiny party in the petri dish.
meanings.sent4: In the world of soil, the supermicros were the tiny architects building unseen structures.
meanings.sent5: The supermicros in the drop of water were like a bustling city under a lens.

meanings.definition: Supermicros: A brand of computer hardware known for its compact size and high performance.
meanings.sent1: Tech enthusiasts prefer supermicros for their powerful yet small computers.
meanings.sent2: The IT department upgraded all the servers with the latest supermicros.
meanings.sent3: The supermicros in the office were so efficient they finished tasks in a blink.
meanings.sent4: His laptop, equipped with supermicros, was a speed demon compared to others.
meanings.sent5: The supermicros transformed the bulky computers into sleek, powerful machines.
